rules: Rule1: If the brewmaster has the skill of recipe design, then alcohol is profitable.
Rule2: Provided that alcohol receives a high rating, if alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, then it is available at a farmers market.
Rule3: Either alcohol is recalled for a health violation, or if alcohol is marketed via social media, then it receives a high rating.
Rule4: Whenever alcohol is listed on an online platform, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.
Rule5: Alcohol is listed on an online platform, or it is produced by a craft brewery.
Rule6: Under the condition that alcohol is produced by a craft brewery, it has the label of organic certification.

Rule7: Either the brewery is partnered with a distributor, or if alcohol has the label of organic certification, then under the condition that it is distributed in the local region, it does not use artificial additives.
Rule8: Whenever alcohol is available at a farmers market, if it is distributed in the local region, then it does not use artificial additives.
Rule9: Provided that it is not the case that the brewmaster has the skill of recipe design, alcohol uses artificial additives.
Rule10: If the brewmaster does not have the skill of recipe design, then alcohol is distributed in the local region.
facts: Fact1: Alcohol is marketed via social media.
Fact2: It is not the case that alcohol is recalled for a health violation.
Fact3: The brewery is not partnered with a distributor.
